items.sentence: Your arrogance makes you think that without you, everything would go wrong.
You don't want to get wet and catch a cold, so take this umbrella with you.
I don't think that many people can say they're satisfied with their salary.
I can't believe a guy like Tom was married to a woman as beautiful as Mary.
I don't often eat in restaurants that have pictures of food on their menus.
Mary cried on Tom's shoulder while she told him how John broke up with her.
Tom and Mary both played with the same orchestra, but not at the same time.
I walked as far as the post office, where I took the bus for Tokyo Station.
The teacher was quite candid about my chances of entering Tokyo University.
Write your name on the blackboard and then introduce yourself to the class.
